alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 8:19PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Volusia County through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over DeLand Airport, or near DeLeon Springs, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... DeLand, DeLeon Springs, DeLand Airport, and Glenwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
